SEARCH
Module com.example.alfredAI
Package com.example.alfredAI.model

Interface IAlfredDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockAlfredDAO, SqliteAlfredDAO
public interface IAlfredDAO
Interface for the Contact Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the Contact class with the database.
